entry.title: It’s Raining Runestones As Bitcoin Ordinals Project Launches Airdrop
entry.summary: More than 90,000 wallets have received their Runestones, which are trading on secondary markets for $1,200.

entry.title: Solana Memecoin BOME Hits $600 Million Market Cap In Less Than Two Days
entry.summary: Created by NFT artist Darkfarms, the ‘Book of Meme’ is stored on Arweave and “endeavors to encapsulate the ever-evolving meme culture within a digital compendium.”

entry.title: Crypto Retraces This Week’s Gains as Traders Take Profits
entry.summary: Bitcoin trades below $70,000 as the entire crypto market contracts 4%.

entry.title: Axie Infinity’s Ronin Chain Sees Renaissance As Gamers Return
entry.summary: RON is up 45% in the past week, with daily users soaring above one million, driven by integrations with third-party games like Pixels.

entry.title: AI Token NetMind Tanks After Early Miner Suffers Hack
entry.summary: NMT plummeted as much as 75% before recovering after the team assured the community that the project was not compromised.

entry.title: Zerion Announces L2 Subsidizing Transaction Fees
entry.summary: Zerion projects fee subsidies will offset revenue from user acquisition to its wallet service.

entry.title: Transaction Fees On Layer 2 Plummet Post Dencun
entry.summary: Fees across leading Layer 2s supporting EIP-4844 have fallen by between 50% and 98%.

entry.title: Beyond Blobs: Diving Into Dencun’s Overlooked Upgrades
entry.summary: In addition to EIP-4844, Dencun also introduced significant upgrades bolstering block space efficiency, user security, and network validation.

entry.title: Trade Solana Memecoins Like A Pro (3 DEGEN TIERS)

The Solana Ecosystem has captured the imagination of creators and traders around the world with an explosive mix of humor, creativity, and of course speculation. Remember the wild rise of Dogecoin last cycle?

entry.title: Game Theory, Market Cycles, Investment Mentality, Mantle Network with Jordi Alexander
entry.summary: Jordi Alexander is the founder of Selini Capital, a trading and venture investing firm focused on digital assets. He's also focused on the Mantle Network, a modular Layer 2 EVM-compatible blockchain that uses optimistic rollups. But before venturing into crypto Jordi was a professional poker player and an expert in game theory.
